description: Grants the user the ability to emit special Noroma Photons in the form of beams that temporarily slow down anything they hit for exactly thirty seconds. The user becomes a Slowness Human.

users.circumstances: Foxy ate the fruit at some point before his debut

abilityReveals.description: Robin demonstrates that Foxy can be affected by his own Noro Noro Beam, forcing him to slow himself down by manipulating him.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Robin uses her Devil Fruit powers to make Foxy hit himself with his own beam, revealing a critical weakness of the ability.

weaknesses.weakness: The beam's effect only lasts 30 seconds
The beam can be reflected using mirrors or reflective surfaces
The user can be affected by their own beams if forced to target themselves

strengths.strength: Can slow down any object, person, or even space itself
strengths.description: The Noroma Photons affect whatever they touch, making it an extremely versatile ability.

description: Allows the user to sprout duplicates of their body parts on any surface, including living beings and objects. The user becomes a Blooming Human.

users.circumstances: Robin ate the fruit as a child

abilityReveals.description: Robin demonstrates advanced tactical use of her powers by manipulating Foxy's body to force him to target himself with his own Noro Noro Beam.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Robin uses her abilities not just for direct combat but to turn opponents' powers against themselves.

strengths.strength: Can manipulate opponents' movements and actions
strengths.description: Robin shows she can use sprouted limbs to force enemies to perform actions against their will.

name.japanese: 名称不明のチーター系ゾオン

description: An unnamed Zoan-class Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a cheetah or cheetah-hybrid form, granting incredible speed and agility.

users.circumstances: Chiqicheetah ate this fruit at some point before appearing in the Davy Back Fight

abilityReveals.description: Allows transformation into full cheetah or cheetah-hybrid form, making the user one of the fastest members of the Foxy Pirates.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Chiqicheetah uses this ability during the Roller Race but is ultimately defeated by Sanji.

weaknesses.weakness: Vulnerable to opponents who understand cheetah biology and dietary needs

strengths.description: Makes the user one of the fastest racers in competitions.
